medical_history.chief_complaint: Foreign body sensation in the throat.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began 6 months prior and the patient experienced voice fatigue frequently. The sensation worsened leading to hospital visit for professional assistance.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 10-year history of smoking 180 packs of cigarettes per year.
medical_history.social_history: Profession as a tour guide, which requires speech.
